page.title: 10Plant Life in Spring
page.content: During the year we have watched the progression of plants along our bank and hedgerow. The hedge consisted of the following plants :- Privet, Hawthorn, Sloe, Plum, Dog Rose, Ash and Elderberry. The steep bank beside the hedge was planted with daffodil bulbs in l983 by local families. At the top of the bank rare white violets were seen along with purple ones. The Spring was late but we saw snowdrops, celandines, primroses, buttercups and above in the field, cowslips and scillas. Later we saw bluebells and wild arum. We have noticed a reduction in the number of flowers in the last few years which may be due to the increasing use of pesticides and fungicides.
